programme.title: Wildcard Kitchen
Guys' Night Out
programme.desc: Eric Adjepong invites three of his favorite guys, Jet Tila,Eddie Jackson and Viet Pham, to his after-hours card game. These epic chefs each arrive with $5,000 for a night of card playing, fast-paced cooking and some major trash talking.

programme.title: Wildcard Kitchen
Competition Pros
programme.desc: After midnight, Eric Adjepong invites top chefs to bring $5,000 of their own money, and play his culinary card game. Eric deals out the dish, time allotted and mandatory ingredients, but it's each chef's secret wildcard that makes or breaks the game.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
Triple D Nation: Mex-Italian and Meatless
programme.desc: Guy Fieri catches up with lights-out lengua at a mom-and-pop taco spot in Phoenix; a meatless butcher in Minneapolis puts their plant-based stamp on a huli-huli rib panini.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
Playin' Chicken
programme.desc: An Alameda, Calif., joint cooks Nashville hot-style chicken and puts a gourmet twist on a burger; in Lansing, Mich., chicken is served French-style at a funky pizza-pasta place; a Kona, Hawaii, spot blends Southern comfort with island flair.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
Far East Flavorfest
programme.desc: Guy Fieri cruises the States to check out some Far-East flavors; in Seattle, a funky chicken spot puts an Asian spin on poultry; a family-run gem dishes out righteous Thai specialties on the big island of Hawaii.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
Handy Helpings
programme.desc: On this trip, Guy Fieri grabs a fistful of righteous hand-held toppings starting with a kolach cafe in Salt Lake City cooking up their Czech specialties with some sweetness and comfort.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
Sandwich Showcase
programme.desc: Guy Fieri is on the road to grab some serious sandwiches; in Austin, a rock-n-roll brunch bar adds a funky touch to meatloaf and a Monte Cristo; a Texas joint puts some '90s hip-hop into its stacked-up specialties.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
Standout Seafood
programme.desc: A restaurant-market in Vancouver combines sustainability with killer cooking, including bouillabaisse and salmon fish and chips; a fresh-catch institution in Kauai, Hawaii, puts out prime-time poke; a raw bar in Chico, Calif., cooks up Asian flavors.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
Spinning the Globe
programme.desc: In Kauai, Hawaii, a culinary dojo amping up local specialties like saimin and chilli pepper chicken; a twist on tacos and burritos in Kansas City, Mo.; a funky food truck in El Paso, Texas, putting out meatless Mexican that's huge on taste.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
From Beef to Bao
programme.desc: Guy's digging into dishes from beef to buns and in Logan, Utah, a place is serving up worldwide flavor, like lomo saltado and a peanut butter burger.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
Filling up on Philly
programme.desc: A taste of Philadelphia; funky malt house serving Buffalo wings; Polish twist on the cheesesteak; longtime tavern making mama's real deal Italian recipes; mother-daughter trio cookin' up authentic Indonesian specialties.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
Classic and Comfort
programme.desc: In a classic, comfort-filled joyride, Guy Fieri finds mozzarella sticks and gravy fries at a retro diner in Leavenworth, Wash.; homestyle fried chicken and grits in Draper, Utah; and stellar meatless chorizo at a vegan spot in Nashville, Tenn.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
Asian and American
programme.desc: Guy Fieri's got Asian flavors, an American classic and some mashups in between; a Korean-Mexican joint in Anchorage, Alaska, rolls out kimchi burritos; a funky fusion spot in Albuquerque, N.M., heads off the charts with the bomb pork belly.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
Flavor Expedition
programme.desc: Starting in Caguas, Puerto Rico, with churrasco steak, risotto and ropa vieja dumplings; grabbing tandoori chicken and samosas in Middleton, N.J., and next-level Filipino dishes in Cleveland.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
Interesting Italian
programme.desc: Guy Fieri is digging into all kinds of Italian; in Santa Barbara, Calif., Dennis Miller's riding shotgun for prime pizza; in Las Vegas, a vegan joint puts its spin on an Italian sandwich; a funky pizzeria stuffs chicken parm into strombolis.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
Great Taste, Surprising Place
programme.desc: Guy Fieri's grabbing big flavor in some unexpected spots; there are south-of-the-border classics cooked up in Calgary, culinary masterpieces in a Memphis museum and an authentic British pub tucked away at a tiny Colorado airport.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
Grand Slam Sammy
programme.desc: Guy Fieri hits the road for serious sammys; a vegan joint in New Jersey plates plant-based perfection, TOC champ Tiffani Faison brings Southern barbecue to Boston and a family spot in California mixes it up with lights-out lamb.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
Specialty Spots
programme.desc: An uncle-nephew duo is changing the game in Gainesville, Fla., with a fried chicken sandwich; there's Mexican gone vegan in Dallas, Texas; a spot in Baton Rouge, LA, is putting their stamp on pot pie.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
Triple D Nation: All Day Long
programme.desc: Guy Fieri revisits popular Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives locations; he samples banana coffee bread in Cambridge, Mass., homemade meatloaf in Chicago and pepper porchetta in Duluth.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
Funky Flavors
programme.desc: Guy Fieri is getting into the funkiest of flavors; in Atlanta, two pals are serving up prime-time patty melt empanadas and a bakery in Los Angeles is plating craveable khachapuri.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
From Vietnamese to Vegan
programme.desc: Guy Fieri visits restaurants with diverse cuisines: he tries Balinese chicken thighs at a Southeast Asian restaurant in Minneapolis and BBQ Reubens at a New Jersey restaurant; a couple prepares plant-based dishes in Montana.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
French Flavor and Meaty Kabobs
programme.desc: Guy Fieri's having Southern meats and more; in Alabama, a family-run barbecue joint is putting out a Boss Burger with a side of ribs; in Atlanta, Chef G. Garvin's steakhouse is serving up a next-level lobster mac and cheese.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
Sandwich-Fest
programme.desc: Guy Fieri hits the road for elevated meatloaf and creative chicken trifecta in Omaha, Neb., dynamite dip and fall-off-the-bone pork in Daphne, Ala., and bomb bao with a righteous Reuben in Stamford, Conn.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
Meat and Sweet
programme.desc: Guy Fieri's piling up the meat with a little sweet; in Santa Barbara, Calif., a hidden gem is putting out funky fusion like Korean paella; in Florida, a Boynton Beach butcher is elevating porchetta; a Boca Raton food truck is cooking cheesecake.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
From Pied to Fried
programme.desc: In St. Petersburg, Florida, a lights-out spot with righteous ramen; in Lansing, a funky joint frying up everything from wings to pig skins to chicken gizzards; a New Orleans smokehouse sausage meat pies and spicy shrimp boudin.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
Sammies and Spice
programme.desc: Sandwiches and serious spice; in Longmont, a spot with a pork burger and cauliflower; in Columbus, a Chicago-style joint with Italian beef and gyros; Aarti Sequeira and Jet Tila join Guy in LA, where a chef dishes out fiery Thai specialties.

programme.desc: Harry and Sally have known each other for years, and are very good friends, but they fear sex would ruin the friendship.

programme.title: The American President

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home
Right In Our Own Backyard

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home
After the Storm

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home

programme.desc: A couple found a modest home on a beautiful lakefront lot, but it needs some serious updates; Brian and Mika look to open up the cramped layout to maximize their views and transform their rundown ranch into a lakeside oasis.

programme.title: 100 Day Dream Home

programme.desc: Brian and Mika continue the challenge of building sisters two houses at the same time, reuniting them after decades of living apart; it is no easy task as they find themselves up against the biggest storm to ever hit the Tampa area.

programme.desc: A couple's home is overflowing with their collections, and now that their son is growing up, they want to be better role models. They enlist Bobby to design a space for family, and they're selling some of their prized collections to help pay for it.

programme.title: Junk or Jackpot?

programme.desc: Opie has a crush on his teacher, who is also Andy's girlfriend.

Barney's Physical
programme.desc: Andy and Aunt Bee help Barney reach the new civil service height and weight requirements so that he can keep his job.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
Family Visit
programme.desc: Andy's patience is tried when the Taylors are visited by relatives.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
The Education of Ernest T. Bass
programme.desc: Ernest T. Bass returns to Mayberry to get his diploma and falls in love with Helen, the town's elementary school teacher and Andy's girlfriend.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
Checkmate
programme.desc: A cop on the verge of shutting down a major drug operation is abducted; Hondo and the squad race to save one of their own before it's too late; Luca grows concerned about sudden changes in Hicks' behavior.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
Sequel
programme.desc: An intruder breaks into the home of a Hollywood actress; Hondo and the team are forced to partner with an old nemesis to track down a dangerous criminal; Tan struggles to find the perfect anniversary gift for his wife.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
Guacaine
programme.desc: When violence erupts at a popular food truck festival, the team must contend with a deadly cartel determined to recover a lost drug shipment at any cost.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
Pariah
programme.desc: When faced with a series of random shootings, one team member's family connections could be the key to stopping the next attack; Hondo prepares to meet Rochelle's parents for the first time; Tan helps Luca navigate a sensitive situation.

programme.title: NCIS
Singled Out
programme.desc: While searching the abandoned and bloody car of a missing Navy lieutenant, the team learns she had been profiling men to find the perfect mate.

programme.title: NCIS
Faking It
programme.desc: The team is called to the scene of the murder of a petty officer who was part of an undercover arms operation.

programme.title: NCIS
Dead and Unburied
programme.desc: The team investigates the death of a missing lance corporal, whose body was buried in the backyard of a vacant house and then exhumed.

programme.title: NCIS
Witch Hunt
programme.desc: The NCIS team investigates when a Marine is attacked in his home and his daughter is kidnapped on Halloween; Abby's Halloween costume leaves McGee and Tony speechless.

programme.title: NCIS
Sandblast
programme.desc: Gibbs' team works with the Army Criminal Investigative Unit to investigate a suspected terrorist attack that killed a Marine colonel at a military country club.

programme.title: NCIS
Once a Hero
programme.desc: Suspicious activity surrounds a decorated Marine veteran's death, leading the NCIS team to try to clear his name.

programme.title: NCIS

programme.desc: McGee takes things into his own hands, forgoing NCIS procedure, when his sister arrives on his doorstep, bloodied and confused.

programme.title: NCIS

programme.desc: The NCIS team joins forces with the FBI when a burned and mummified body found in a furnace turns out to be that of a serial killer the FBI had been chasing for more than a decade.

programme.title: Blue Bloods

programme.desc: Frank causes family tension when he assigns Jamie to guard Danny after a hit is put on him; Frank tries to stop his grandson from seeking revenge after he's attacked; Eddie gets a hostile new partner.

programme.title: Blue Bloods
USA Today
programme.desc: Danny and Baez's attempts to find who assaulted a shop owner are hindered by the community's refusal to cooperate; Erin's suspicions about her boss rise; Gormley, Garrett and Baker are threatened by a new staff member.

programme.title: Blue Bloods
Reality Check
programme.desc: Danny partners with Anthony to solve a double homicide when Anthony's shady cousin proves to have gang ties to the crime; the boundary between Eddie and Jamie's work and personal relationship becomes strained.

programme.title: Blue Bloods

programme.desc: A cyber-attack on the NYPD forces Danny and Baez to release an evasive suspect; Baez questions her place within the NYPD; Eddie is torn over a workplace dilemma; Jamie wrestles with a family secret.

programme.title: Blue Bloods
Old Friends
programme.desc: An illegal drug shipment arriving in New York City must be found before the narcotics flood the streets; Jamie helps a neighbor handle a gambling debt; Frank receives pushback from Mayor Chase over his handling of a brawl.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
Aunt Bee's Romance
programme.desc: Aunt Bee's former beau, Roger Hanover, pays her a visit and begins courting her again. Andy and Opie soon become annoyed at Roger's bad jokes and gags.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
Barney's Bloodhound
programme.desc: Barney tries to train Blue, a bloodhound, to track criminals. His plan backfires when he leads Blue to a criminal and the dog starts obeying him instead of Barney.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
Man in the Middle
programme.desc: Barney and Thelma Lou have an argument. When Andy tries to console Barney, it leads to a parade of other arguments among Andy, Barney, Thelma Lou and Helen.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
Barney's Uniform
programme.desc: Barney starts wearing his uniform all the time after a tough guy threatens to beat him up if he catches Barney out of uniform.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
Opie's Fortune
programme.desc: Opie finds a purse containing $50, but Andy tells him that the money will only be his if no one claims it within a week. Soon, Opie gets the money but has to return it.

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show
